Package jNetDev

Class Summary
jND_BYTE1 jND_BYTE1
The lack of unsigned types in Java is a problem.
jND_BYTE2 jND_BYTE2
The lack of unsigned types in Java is a problem.
jND_BYTE4 jND_BYTE4
The lack of unsigned types in Java is a problem.
jND_BYTE8 jND_BYTE8
The lack of unsigned types in Java is a problem.
jND_CaptureSession jND_CaptureSession
A class to enable the capturing of packets.
jND_CaptureThread jND_CaptureThread
Class to implement the thread used to capture packets during an active capture session.
jND_Mutex jND_Mutex
Class to implement an object for synchronization.
jND_NIC jND_NIC
Class to model a NIC on the machine.
jND_NICList jND_NICList
This class models the list of all NICs in the machine.
jND_PacketQueue jND_PacketQueue
Class to implement a queue of packets to hold packets captured by the thread of a jND_CaptureSession, until retrieved by the user.
jND_Utility jND_Utility
This is a class of all static methods that provide a variety of utility functions.
 

Exception Summary
jND_Exception jND_Exception
This class extends the standard Exception by adding a custom message.
